querystring.select: SELECT A.APP_NO AS AppNo, A.APP_ID AS AppId, AG.NUM_OF_ASSET AS NumOfAsset, AG.AGRMNT_NO AS AgrmntNo, AG.AGRMNT_ID AS AgrmntId, AG.TENOR AS Tenor, AG.CUST_NAME AS CustName, AFD.MR_INTEREST_TYPE_CODE AS MrInterestTypeCode, AG.PROD_OFFERING_NAME AS ProdOfferingName, AG.PROD_OFFERING_CODE AS ProdOfferingCode, AG.PROD_OFFERING_VERSION AS ProdOfferingVersion, AFD.MR_INST_SCHEME_CODE AS MrInstSchemeCode, RMA.DESCR AS MrInterestTypeName, RMB.DESCR AS MrInstSchemeName
querystring.from: FROM DBO.APP A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN DBO.AGRMNT AG WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_ID = AG.APP_ID LEFT JOIN DBO.AGRMNT_FIN_DATA AFD WITH(NOLOCK) ON AG.AGRMNT_ID = AFD.AGRMNT_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMA ON RMA.MASTER_CODE = AFD.MR_INTEREST_TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMB ON RMB.MASTER_CODE = AFD.MR_INST_SCHEME_CODE
querystring.where: WHERE RMA.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'INTRSTTYPE' AND RMB.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'INST_SCHM' AND A.APP_ID = {0}
